amendment.description: To insert a provision relating to notification information concerning pharmacy services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1936 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1936 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S13116; text: CR S13116) To insert a provision relating to notification information concerning pharmacy services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1936 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1936 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
